name: Helios Mobility Systems
founding_story_summary: Founded as a spin-off from a university battery lab to address thermal runaway in early EV prototypes, starting with a small team in a garage focused on solid-state separators.
mission_statement: To pioneer safer, more efficient energy storage solutions for the global shift to electrified mobility.
primary_products: VoltEdge S95 high-density battery modules; FluxGrid BMS (battery management system) with anomaly detection; ThermoShield thermal barriers
primary_services: Field telemetry analytics; Custom OEM integration services; Warranty and recall support
core_ip_assets: Adaptive BMS algorithms; Solid-state separator designs; Real-time anomaly detection patents
subsidiaries: Helios Europe GmbH (Berlin, Germany); Helios APAC Pte Ltd (Singapore)
major_customers: Autovista Motors (USA); UrbanEV Fleet (EU); RailTrak Systems (APAC)
major_suppliers: LithionChem (battery cells, China); NeoCopper (conductors, USA); PixelForge (optics, acquired 2024)
go_to_market_strategy: Direct B2B sales to OEMs; Strategic partnerships with tier-1 suppliers; Online configurator for custom modules
pricing_model: Tiered pricing: Per-unit volume discounts + annual SLA fees for analytics; Freemium trials for BMS software
primary_cloud_provider: AWS (primary) with Azure backups for EU compliance
erp_system: SAP S/4HANA for ERP and supply chain
crm_system: Salesforce CRM with custom EV integrations
data_stack: Databricks for analytics; Snowflake for data warehousing; Kafka for real-time telemetry
security_certifications: ISO 27001; SOC 2 Type II; IATF 16949 (automotive quality)
environmental_goals: Achieve net-zero operations by 2035; Source 30% energy from renewables by 2027; Reduce Scope 3 emissions by 15% annually
diversity_goals: Reach 40% women in management roles by 2028; Expand STEM apprenticeship programs for underrepresented groups; Annual DEI audits
esg_policy_summary: Comprehensive ESG framework focusing on sustainable sourcing, ethical labor, and circular economy principles for battery recycling.
risk_register_top3: 1. Supply chain concentration risk (mitigated by dual-sourcing); 2. Regulatory compliance for EV safety standards; 3. IP infringement from competitors
competitors: Voltix Dynamics (USA); EastCell Corp (China); Magna Electro (Canada)
regulators: US NHTSA (safety); EU DG COMP (antitrust); TÜV Rheinland (certification)
transfer_pricing_method: Transactional Net Margin Method (TNMM) with 3rd-party benchmarks
cash_management_policy: Maintain minimum 6 months liquidity; Diversified deposits across A-rated banks; Counterparty limits at A- or better
treasury_risk_limits: VaR limit $3.5M daily; FX exposure hedged within ±$1.2M; Interest rate swaps for debt
board_committees: Audit; Risk & Compliance; Compensation; Nominating & Governance; ESG
